summary: The module defines automated test suites for the Hunyuan DiT ControlNet image generation pipeline, including fast checks for component setup, inference consistency, batch processing, optional serialization, and CPU offload, as well as comprehensive slow integration tests covering multiple conditioning modalities such as edge, depth, and pose signals.
business_intent: To ensure the reliability, correctness, and performance of the Hunyuan DiT ControlNet pipeline across different hardware setups and conditioning inputs, thereby supporting highâ€‘quality product releases and reducing regression risk.
